name: Business Beginner
desc: Use trade knowledge to help the town and its vicinity restore stability.

name: Suppress Speculative Trading in Grains
desc: In the time of grain shortage, some despicable speculators are hoarding for profit. We must thwart their actions.

name: Local Protection
desc: Our caravans are facing trouble in Waverun City. Let's try to resolve this matter.

name: Build the Mine Pit
desc: Help the refugees build their new homes and develop their own vital industries.

name: Market Expansion
desc: Under the influence of wars and Darklight, business has become challenging. We need to pioneer new markets.

name: Investigate Explosives Production
desc: Investigate Windyvale Town's new industry.

name: Pillar Industry of Mine Pit
desc: Help Mine Pit develop its core industry.

name: Lutfi's Promise
desc: Lutfi is offering a generous price for Luxites delivered to Waverun City.

name: "History Lover"
desc: Tranquillo wants one of our ancient books, claiming he's merely interested in history.

name: Restore Relationship
desc: Acambe suggests that we repair our relationship with the King's Army through trade.

name: Bribe the Papal States' Nobility
desc: Despite the Papal States’ ban on exporting Luxites, we can resort to unconventional methods to obtain them if necessary.

name: Luck Weaving
desc: During certain seasons, handmade crafts called "Fortune Net" adorn the treetops of Vltar Mountain, gaining popularity in some areas. Perhaps we can collaborate with the Vlderians to establish this business jointly.

name: Pass on the Torch
desc: With our help, Mine Pit has flourished, and now we can assist the nearby regions in fending off threats and regaining self-sufficiency. Maybe those who joined the Darklight due to poverty will also have a chance to straighten up.

name: Homa's Business
desc: Homa needs to smuggle a healing herb native to Iria into Elaman to help the injured slaves.

name: Blood Tracks
desc: You've received arms orders from both Mornrays Castle and Waverun City. Are there truly some coins more noble or vile than others?

name: Bring Light to the Dark
desc: Disband the Darklight

name: Fend Off Threats
desc: The Vlderians are facing twin threats from both the Elamanians and the Darklight, but luckily, we are now highly skilled at organizing defenses.

name: Extradite the Traitor
desc: The Papal States demands that we send Tranquillo back.

name: Keepers of History
desc: Send Taair the ancient book we acquired.

name: The Era of Luxites
desc: With plenty of trading opportunities now for Luxites, we can fulfill the Order's demands through fair trade and bring about a new era of peace for Iria.

name: Royalty Obsession
desc: A noble in Lightgloam City has an obsession with regal artifacts, and is willing to pay a hefty price to add them to his collection.

name: Premium Dye
desc: The dye trade in Rabi'a Oasis is potentially lucrative, if only there's a way in…

name: Gather Proof of Guilt Against the Papal States
desc: Gather proof of guilt against the Papal States to use as leverage in the final negotiations.

name: Gather Proof of Guilt Against the Order
desc: Gather proof of guilt against the Council of Knights to use as leverage in the final negotiations.
